scene.name: intro
scene.option: Did my Johnny talk your ear off out here?

scene.name: johnny
scene.option: I suspect there are some things he can only say to animals.
Damn, he's even got `me` talking to dogs now.

scene.name: only-say-to-animals
scene.option: I guess that's just how people are â€” different thoughts for different listeners ...
I'd like to to think he could say `anything` to me ...

scene.name: got-me-talking-to-dogs
scene.option: I think I can see why he does it. You're a good listener Val.
Don't think I'll make a habit of it. No offense.

scene.name: plans
scene.option: Us, I think we'll just see where the river goes. And at what pace.
Me and Johnny should probably start looking for a place to stop and recharge for the day.

scene.name: where-the-river-goes
scene.option: No sense rushing it, right? You can't rush the river.
You look like you've got that figured out already, Val.

scene.name: recharge
scene.option: Maybe that'll be the same place the rest of our little one-night crew ends up ...
Maybe we'll just follow you and Cate and the `Mammoth` for a while.
